analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering a two-column feature section with an image and accompanying text (title and description). It optionally flips column order based on a prop and sets up basic i18n messages for English.
analysis.Purpose: To display a feature block on the landing page, showcasing an image alongside a title and description, with optional ordering control.

Components.name: SectionFeature
Components.description: Root component handling display of image and text in two columns.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue composition API helper to define incoming props: image (String), title (String), description (String), order (Boolean).

Functions.name: useI18n
Functions.description: Initializes internationalization context with custom messages.

Functions.name: t
Functions.description: Translation function returned by useI18n; intended to fetch localized strings by key.

analysis.Usage: Imported and used in landing page modules or parent layout components. Example: import SectionFeature from 'modules/landing/components/sections/SectionFeature.vue'; then used in template as <SectionFeature :image="..." :title="..." :description="..." :order="..."/>.
Notes: Styles are global (not scoped) and only define the .order-2 class.
i18n setup provides English messages but the component currently binds directly to props for title/description instead of using the t() function, suggesting incomplete integration.
Image tag uses loading="lazy" and object-fit-cover utilities for performance and layout.
